prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a vibrant red body and yellow spots.
Imagine a cute aquatic creature with eight tentacles and a playful demeanor.
Design a Pokemon that lives in the ocean and has a unique round shape.
Generate a character resembling an octopus with bright colors and a friendly expression.
Make a Pokemon that can shoot water blasts and has a striking appearance.
Show me an underwater creature that combines cuteness and strength in its design.
Give me a Pokemon that blends bright colors and aquatic features seamlessly.
